visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Y-axis labels should be in Verdana font, size 10, and color #666666; Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data provided in the JavaScript code; Custom colors: Use the color #FF6347 for the series; Additional configurations: Set the chart background to #F9F9F9, add a legend with the title 'Legend', and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The X-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333, while the Y-axis labels use Verdana font, size 10, and color #666666. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly temperature data. The series color is set to #FF6347. The chart background is set to #F9F9F9, and the margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides. A legend with the title 'Legend' is also included in the configuration.
